description:
Installation of one three piece wall mounted sign comprising panels measuring 2000 x 1050, 2000 x 750 and 2000 x 1040 on the south facing elevation at first and second floor levels. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  20.01/13A, 14, 15 and letter dated                         20th August 2002.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposal, by reason of its size, illumination and prominent siting would seriously detract from the unique character and visual appearance of this host building and would give rise to an intrusive, dominant and discordant feature in the street scene, detrimental to the visual amenities of the locality generally and would harm the character and appearance of the Barnsbury Conservation Area/ Article IV Direction Area, contrary to policy Env11 of the Council's Unitary Development Plan 2002.
